医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
眶额皮质蕴藏着理解和预防抑郁症的线索《JCCP Advances》上发表的新研究表明，童年时期经历负面生活事件 (NLE) 与成年早期出现抑郁症状的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Orbitofrontal-cortex-holds-clues-for-understanding-and-preventing-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Orbitofrontal-cortex-holds-clues-for-understanding-and-preventing-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=059ced22-9000-4371-b3ec-22b9b7027be7 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 09:12:17 -0500 Orbitofrontal cortex holds clues for understanding and preventing depression
住房不稳定会增加退伍军人患阿尔茨海默病的风险最近发表在《美国老年医学会杂志》上的一项研究表明，住房不稳定的退伍军人被诊断为阿尔茨海默病或相关痴呆症 (ADRD) 的可能性比住房稳定的退伍军人高 53%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Housing-instability-heightens-Alzheimers-risk-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Housing-instability-heightens-Alzheimers-risk-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5100d9c-3f51-4984-bd19-62d3e0fbe80a Wed, 06 Dec 2023 09:00:18 -0500 Housing instability heightens Alzheimer's risk in veterans
帕金森病患者出现冻结步态的危险因素影响冻结步态或 FOG 发生的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Risk-factors-for-the-development-of-freezing-of-gait-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Risk-factors-for-the-development-of-freezing-of-gait-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d100b6d-b4fe-4bf0-b850-64e91392551b Wed, 06 Dec 2023 08:52:00 -0500 Risk factors for the development of freezing of gait in Parkinson’s disease patients
抗肥胖药物可能为骨关节炎患者提供生存益处发表在《关节炎与风湿病学》上的新研究表明，对于超重或肥胖且患有膝关节或髋关节骨关节炎的人来说，抗肥胖药物引起的缓慢至中度但不是快速的体重减轻速度可能会降低他们的风险的过早死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Anti-obesity-medications-may-offer-survival-benefits-for-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Anti-obesity-medications-may-offer-survival-benefits-for-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0a2547e-c0ba-4b15-b469-5ed8e7cb71e6 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 08:48:44 -0500 Anti-obesity medications may offer survival benefits for osteoarthritis patients
脑刺激为精神分裂症患者的前瞻性记忆缺陷提供了希望大多数精神分裂症患者都有广泛的记忆障碍，包括前瞻性记忆，即记住执行未来活动的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Brain-stimulation-offers-promise-for-prospective-memory-deficits-in-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Brain-stimulation-offers-promise-for-prospective-memory-deficits-in-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa8e4db4-bd5d-4d43-97f4-70bd869f40d2 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 08:45:23 -0500 Brain stimulation offers promise for prospective memory deficits in schizophrenia
这些计划将未使用的处方药送到有需要的患者手中最近 11 月的一个晚上，安吉·菲尼克斯 (Angie Phoenix) 在科罗拉多州第二大城市的一家药店等候领取处方药，以治疗她的高血压和手臂癫痫发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/These-programs-put-unused-prescription-drugs-in-the-hands-of-病人-in-need.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/These-programs-put-unused-prescription-drugs-in-the-hands-of-病人-in-need.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11126285-257d-4121-9a2b-47ccbc3669fb Wed, 06 Dec 2023 07:48:02 -0500 These programs put unused prescription drugs in the hands of patients in need
拜登希望各州确保奥巴马医改计划覆盖足够的医生和医院根据 11 月提出的规则，拜登政府计划推动各州加强对奥巴马医改计划承保的医生、医院和其他医疗服务提供商保险公司数量的监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Biden-wants-states-to-ensure-Obamacare-plans-cover-enough-doctors-and-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Biden-wants-states-to-ensure-Obamacare-plans-cover-enough-doctors-and-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55934aea-e81b-450a-90e6-99605611c397 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 07:46:29 -0500 Biden wants states to ensure Obamacare plans cover enough doctors and hospitals
